child_menus.name: PHP Environment Setup
child_menus.content:
### PHP Environment Setup

To set up the PHP environment, follow these steps:

1. Install PHP: 
~~~sh
brew install php
~~~

2. Verify installation:

~~~
php -v
~~~

3. Set up a local server:

~~~
php -S localhost:8000
~~~

child_menus.name: Node.js Environment Setup
child_menus.content:
### Node.js Environment Setup

To set up the Node.js environment, follow these steps:

1. Install Node.js and npm:

~~~
brew install node
~~~

2. Verify installation:

~~~
node -v
~~~

3. Install common packages:

~~~
npm install express
~~~
